anime.name: Tsugu Tsugumomo
anime.synopsis:
The second season of Tsugumomo.

When "ordinary boy" Kazuya Kagami meets the beautiful tsukumogami Kiriha, his life gets turned upside-down. As a "Taboo Child" who draws the supernatural towards him, he receives orders from the God of the Land, Kukuri, to become an exorcist and defeat these evil forces. And so, he and Kiriha do battle.

To find out information on these supernatural beings, Kazuya and his friends set up a counselor's club at school. But behind the typical-seeming troubles he hears about, he uncovers a major plot to target Kukuri...

In addition to the sadistic-yet-beautiful tsukumogami Kiriha, the situation draws other girls to Kazuya to join the fray!

(Source: Crunchyroll)

song.title: Kaze Fukeba Tsukiyo no Hate ni
